Articles.Content:
Well dig some foxholes ,and use this atomic warhead to disable your electronics.

Next poster you face my dupstep cannon.

Sound blocker.

The next poster will be thrown into a 30 foot (10 meter) deep pool of sulfuric acid at 100% concentration.

Pool's closed.

The next poster gets hit with a banhammer.

Wearing Warhammer 40k MkV Armor, almost nothing can hurt me....

Next poster is in a car which is in a scrap press which was activated.

Thankfully, it's broken and does nothing.

Next poster is in the incinerator in Toy Story 3, being dragged down by an army of Lotso Hugging Bears.

I mount the next poster to a mainsail while in low orbit over the sun and sacrifice them by stabbing them through the heart with the root of a Krakenbane plant. The ritual of Kraken-warding is complete, and I now am untouchable by the evils of the Kraken.

I'm a Timelord and have two hearts. As I perform the transfer burn to get a Moho intercept (from which I can gravity assist my way back to my TARDIS), my Mainsail's exhaust does not miss the next poster.

Force field!

Next poster will be captured and put into a North Korean prison camp.

Korea declares war on america. America and China and Russia then gang up on N. Korea, kicking their asses, thus rescuing me!

Eric Cartman taunts the next poster.

I won't respect his authoritah!

The next poster gets caught between a rock and the deep blue sea.

np im used to leave in a yell oh sub-Marines.

The next poster can't stop loss everyone childs.
I defend against WinkAllkerb with a logic shield and then throw it at the next poster.

Force fields!

The next poster will be encased in molten uranium.
I turn into the Incredible Hulk, and am very mad at the next poster for being encased in molten uranium.

Pointblank nuclear blast. No chance of survival, even as the hulk.

The next poster was also in the nuclear blast

Indeed i m the duke and i may nuke'them or not.

The next poster spam eat Mc Donald to death.

Mc Donald to death

Mc Donald to death

Mc Donald to death

That was harmless. On the other hand, the joke that kills you isn't...

I roll a critical failure on my sense of humour check, and am unharmed.

The next poster rolls a critical failure on their heart beating check.

My heart stops beating, and I gasp as I realize that it is still beating as I am not a character in an RPG. Probably.

The next poster is purple oranges.

I blow up Yosemite, CA and then blow up the next poster.

When I say Yosemite, CA, I mean Yosemite National Park.

My heart stops beating, and I gasp as I realize that it is still beating as I am not a character in an RPG. Probably.

The next poster is purple oranges.

What are you calling me? "Purple Oranges"?

The next person got called the same name.
No one gets what it means, so a black hole forms that sucks the next poster in.

There nothing to see in a black hole but a missunderstoodable occultation, even if old you can feel your pretty young. That's what a Friend told me.

while not surviving this attack the next poster now know what's meaningless mean.

Ooh! Ooh! Meaningless means the attack you just threw at me!

I banish thou to Zemnark, the worst of all possible Denmarks!

Never heard of it.

The next poster will be trapped inside the Earth's inner core.

I happen to have a super drill with extra tech and magic and underground boosters.

Hey! You down there! You're in space on a station which is rapidly losing oxygen!
